title: LFM silver team
body:
Hello,
we are currently looking for a top and support player for the 2016 ranked season! We currently are all silver but are also looking for some experienced or higher ranked players to join and help out, we are a here to win team and we will be playing quite seriously during season 6, we want someone who is quite active and friendly! and has a large champion pool,  message me or add me and we will see how you go my IGN is kineticfire or add riseley
thank you :)

replies.body:
If you need another member, i'm more then happy to join.

IGN: Area2609
Hey im down to join add me Darkderma i main support and am currently gold 4 :)
Yo iam keen add me MrAwesomeOne, iam a top and a support player aswell.
